RESOURCE.NAME: UIMA Analysis Engine
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Wrapper for a Text Analysis Engine from UIMA.

PARAMETER.NAME: analysisEngineDescriptor
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The XML descriptor for the UIMA AE. This must be a file: URL

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingDescriptor
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The XML file describing the mapping between GATE and UIMA annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to use for annotations to be mapped to and from UIMA
